package.name: DB_DataObject
package.summary: An SQL Builder, Object Interface to Database Tables
package.description: DataObject performs 2 tasks: 1. Builds SQL statements based on the objects vars and the builder methods. 2. acts as a datastore for a table row. The core class is designed to be extended for each of your tables so that you put the data logic inside the data classes. included is a Generator to make your configuration files and your base classes.

release.notes: Removed list method call, First upload as pear package. - Documentation now in PEAR Manual
Removed list method, First upload as pear package. - Documentation now in PEAR Manual
